teacher_faqs.question: How will the community service hours be documented? Will I receive official records of service hours from this?
teacher_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**If you are accepted as a teacher, Robotics for All is a 501(c)(3) organization and we will be glad to provide documentation or signatures needed to verify hours!**

<!--EndFragment-->

teacher_faqs.question: Are there training programs available to the teachers?
teacher_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**If you are accepted as a teacher we will give you some basic training, although it’s primary purpose is to explain our software and policies. We can offer additional support as needed.**

<!--EndFragment-->

teacher_faqs.question: How many students are there per class?
teacher_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**There are 3 to 15 students per class with a 1:5 student to teacher ratio.**  



<!--EndFragment-->

ta_faqs.question: How many leading opportunities will there be?
ta_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**Feel free to ask the lead instructor for opportunities to lead the class when you feel comfortable. You will also have the opportunity to become a lead instructor after being a TA for 8 weeks.** 



<!--EndFragment-->

ta_faqs.question: How soon will you be able to start teaching classes?
ta_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**Once a new session starts, a form will be sent to you that contains all available classes to teach. The system is first come-first serve. You will be waitlisted for each of the classes you are available to teach. If you are chosen to teach a class, an email will be sent to you which will include class details.** 



<!--EndFragment-->

ta_faqs.question: What software will we be using to teach?
ta_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**We will be using Zoom and Google Classroom to teach. There are a few school specific exceptions to this.**



<!--EndFragment-->

intern_faqs.question: What specific tasks would I be doing for this position?
intern_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**Tasks will vary depending on area, but some common ones include outreach, curriculum development, publicity planning, and software development.**



<!--EndFragment-->

intern_faqs.question: When would I start?
intern_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**The internship runs in 8 week cycles year round.  The next session will be the Spring 2022 session. Candidates are usually accepted before the start of an internship. If accepted, a Robotics For All representative will contact you with details about the orientation.**



<!--EndFragment-->

intern_faqs.question: I do not live in the United States of America. Am I still eligible to apply?
intern_faqs.answer:
<!--StartFragment-->

**Yes, you may apply! However, please keep in mind that all meetings are optimized for the US Pacific and Eastern time zones.** 



<!--EndFragment-->
